items.sentence: At one time, I used to go jogging every morning.
At present, the cause of the disease is unknown.
Because of the dense fog, nothing could be seen.
Because of the pills I took, the pain went away.
Does anybody remember why we decided to do this?
Everyone in the class learned the poem by heart.
I don\'t believe that black cats cause bad luck.
I don\'t need your money. I just need your time.
I don\'t think Tom will ever be able to do that.
What do you spend a majority of your time doing?
What does Tom think is the most important point?
What exactly do you remember about the accident?
What makes you so sure I want to be your friend?
What makes you think that Tom likes heavy metal?
Tom can\'t read any menu not written in English.
Tom can\'t remember where he put his sunglasses.
Tom can\'t speak French without making mistakes.
I didn\'t realize you didn\'t understand French.
You should be careful in your choice of friends.
You should call your father as soon as possible.
